title: Sofia Gomez Villafañe and Keegan Swenson Top the Final Standings at the Life Time Grand Prix
content:
20 riders leave Bentonville with a chunk of the $250,000 prize money; applications for next year's series are open until October 25.

Read the full article at Sofia Gomez Villafañe and Keegan Swenson Top the Final Standings at the Life Time Grand Prix on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
